name: NSEdgeInsets
desc: A description of the distance between the edges of two rectangles.

items.name: var bottom: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance from the bottom of the source rectangle to the bottom of the result rectangle.

items.name: var left: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance from the left side of the source rectangle to the left side of the result rectangle.

items.name: var right: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance from the right side of the source rectangle to the right side of the result rectangle.

items.name: var top: CGFloat
items.desc: The distance from the top of the source rectangle to the top of the result rectangle.

items.name: func NSEdgeInsetsMake(CGFloat, CGFloat, CGFloat, CGFloat) -> NSEdgeInsets
init(top: CGFloat, left: CGFloat, bottom: CGFloat, right: CGFloat)
